title: Ed Wood Jr | Bride of the Monster (1955) Bela Lugosi, Tor Johnson | Horror, Sci-Fi | Movie, Subtitle

sources.title: Ed Wood Jr | Bride of the Monster (1955) Bela Lugosi, Tor Johnson | Horror, Sci-Fi | Movie, Subtitle
sources.description:
It'll make your skin crawl! A mad doctor attempts to create atomic supermen.
Dr. Eric Vornoff, with the help of his mute assistant Lobo, captures twelve men for a grisly experiment. His goal is to turn them into supermen using atomic energy. Reporter Janet Lawton, fiancée of the local lieutenant, vows to investigate Vornoff’s supposedly haunted house.

Original title: Bride of the Monster (1955) AKA Bride of the Atom / The Atomic Monster


Colorized version: https://youtu.be/p41kESTMp54

Director: Edward D. Wood Jr.
Writers: Edward D. Wood Jr., Alex Gordon
Stars: Bela Lugosi, Tor Johnson, Tony McCoy, Loretta King
Genres: B Movie, Horror, Sci-Fi, Psychotronic film


@CultCinemaClassics
